text: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
translation: (70) So the magicians fell down in prostration.[841] They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
footnotes: [841]- After they had seen the miracles which Allāh had given Moses and that they were realities and not merely impressions of magic.
